nodes.bodyText: This should only make a new formatter on config change.
This looks like it is not set if ConfigChanged is not fired? Also, why is this static?
This is static due to the methods using it being static, I have no idea why the methods were made static at one point.
Because they didn't depend on the state of a variable.
Maybe this should be an enum to better convey the format?
